ygData.subject: Re: List activity? Let get it going.
ygData.msgSnippet: 10 charisma will be VERY useful when buying expensive items such as combine weapons and platemail. ... From: Ben Pocock  To:
ygData.messageBody:
10 charisma will be VERY useful when buying expensive items such as combine
weapons and platemail.
----- Original Message -----
From: Ben Pocock <bpocock@...>
To: <EQ-Quest@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 7:19 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] List activity? Let get it going.


> From: bpocock@... (Ben Pocock)
>
> On Mon, 17 May 1999 12:38:30 -0700, you wrote:
>
> >From: "K" <kayntwhyle@...>
> >
> >+ 10 CHA is -far- from a waste of time. Can you tell us how to get this
> >item?
>
> Just wondering... what do you think +10 charisma will get you? I had
> Spirit of the Snake when I was a Shaman, giving me +20 Mana and even
> more, yet it made almost NO difference in buying stuff (maybe +5%
> maximum). +10 does seem like a big waste of time to me, but perhaps
> I'm missing something.
> --------------------------------------------------
> Ben Pocock
> bpocock@...
> http://www.golden.net/~bpocock
> --------------------------------------------------
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Where do some of the Internet's largest email lists reside?
> http://www.onelist.com
> At ONElist - the most scalable and reliable service on the Internet.
